newsitem.title: UK: Wiggins in agreed bid for Tomorrows Lesiure.
newsitem.headline: Wiggins in agreed bid for Tomorrows Lesiure.

text.p: Wiggins Group Plc said on Tuesday it has made a recommended offer for Tomorrows Lesiure Plc, valuing the company at 16.2 million stg.
The offer is on the basis of one new Wiggins share for every Tomorrows Leisure share, valuing each of Tomorrows shares at 10.25p.

"The merger will bring together Wiggins' expertise in commercial, leisure and residential property development with Tomorrows Leisure's prime development sites" in Essex and Liverpool, Wiggins said in a statement.
The company said it held about 39.5 million Tomorrows shares, representing 25 percent of the firm's ordinary share capital, and has been represented on the firm's board since January 1995.
Tomorrows Leisure's shares shot up 2.75p to 9.0, while Wiggins dropped 0.5p to 9.75.
